title: Converse Rubber Tracks: Geek Out - Guitar Mic'ing
description:
In this segment of Geek Out presented by Guitar Center, the Converse Rubber Tracks team demonstrates the basic microphone placement for recording an electric guitar amplifier. During this piece, the importance of phase is discussed when the staff tries some variations that include adding rear-cabinet and room microphones.

For more on Converse Rubber Tracks visit:
http://www.converse.com/rubbertracks
